The Dungeon Days team

Ted Sherman

Poet & Storyteller

Ted’s passion is music, poetry and storytelling, he is the creator of Dungeon Days. He works by day as a Public Health commisioner and programme manager, which has influenced the world we are creating.

Marcus Kielly

Illustrator

Marcus has over 35 years of illustration experience, working on character development and sweating every detail of the visuals for the dungeon. He is a software engineer by day, running distributed international teams.

Ollie Francis

Designer

Ollie has worked as print and digital designer for over 25 years - he loves creating functional and beautiful experiences. He runs his own digital consultancy working with brands-for-good.
